text_block_list.text:
A day off. With my bag in hand, 
I was walking around a mall nearby――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Tore-cchi? Yohoo yohoo~♡ 
Tore-cchi, are you doing some shopping??

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeh~! Even though it's a day off? 
Just walking around is a real waste!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, in that case, how about going on a shopping date♪? 
I was just thinking about taking a look around this mall!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Let's look for something that'll get Tore-cchi excited, together♡

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Kyaa-♡ These pink earrings, apparently they're a new product! 
The diamonds are really sparkly, so it just screams Celeb!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Wearing them during training could work just like a charm! It'll 
look good with the jersey♡ Tore-cchi, it's definitely a must-buy!
choice_data_list: Hmmm, there's a risk of injury though……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eeeh! Tore-cchi, it'll look good on you though~. Ah, then how 
about that!? It looks like something you could use everyday so――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Look, look! That shocking pink knit is trendy overseas, you know! 
And what about using that shirt as another layer?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Awwww! They said the new smart phone is all sold out. It has all 
the latest functionality and I wanted to recommend it though~.

After that we kept looking around but, nothing caught 
my eye so I ended up not buying anything――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Tadaaaa!! We're here! It's the street market~!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
This event is really interesting, you know?! 
The shops here only have stuff from the recent trends!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
There's all kinds of genres here, so I expect great 
things! Look, how about over there!? There's so many 
people……I get the feeling it'll be exciting!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, we should probably hurry or everything 
might be sold out too!? Tore-cchi, hurry, hurry~!!
(Snap!!)

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Uuuu~~~……I'm really really sorry, Tore-cchi……
In a panic, Vivlos had pulled on my bag……and the strap had broken.

I had been using it regularly for a while, 
so it was probably due to wear and tear.
choice_data_list: Maybe I'll find a new bag here

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
! Then I'll definitely find a good one! 
To make up for breaking it!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Um…… umm~~! ……Ah!! How about that shop!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Look, they've got one on display! It's got a real antique 
feel to it, isn't it great? I wonder which brand it is~♪

True, that bag had a nice aesthetic to it. It had a nice 
texture as well. When we asked the stall attendant about it――

text_block_list.name: Old Stall Attendant
text_block_list.text:
――Aah, this bag……sorry, but it's not a 
product for sale. It's mine, you see.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ah, sorry! I just thought it was a great bag……! 
……Um, in that case, can you tell me what brand it is?

text_block_list.name: Old Stall Attendant
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, it's not a brand name. It's just a plain old bag. 
But……to me, it's a very important bag.

text_block_list.name: Old Stall Attendant
text_block_list.text:
When I was younger, a close friend gave it to me as a present. 
I used it for years while keeping it maintained.
While saying that……the shop clerk had a gentle look in his eyes.

text_block_list.name: Old Stall Attendant
text_block_list.text:
The color has faded and there's scuff marks all 
over. But……every time I look at it, I can't help 
but remember those days we spent together.

I was sure that each and every one of those scratches and that 
faded color……for him, they had many memories attached to them.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I see…… 
I just thought that was the way it was designed.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: But, even then……it's a heart-warming bag, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Old Stall Attendant
text_block_list.text:
Haha, thanks. 
That bag you have is wonderful too.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm……Tore-cchi, how was it? 
We looked at quite a few……

When she said that, I looked at the bag in my hand again. 
It was still the same bag but……it still somehow felt different.
choice_data_list: ……Maybe I won't get a new one.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――Eh? Are you fine not getting a new one……?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Mark……? You mean this blackened spot? 
Looks like something got stuck there――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah! Is that from when we first went on a trip……?!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
『Ahahahaa! To think your bag would get stuck in the door! 
Aren't you glad we were able to still get off~?』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Right, right! And you were really really 
grateful to the conductor that helped us!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah! Then, do you remember this heart-shaped mark too?

text_block_list.name: Fan's Child
text_block_list.text: 『Hick……Uuuu……I'm sorry……about the bag……』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
『D-don't cry, it's fine~! With something like juice, you 
just have to wipe it off and it'll be OK! And um……um!』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
『Ah, look!? See? The stain on the bag! 
It's heart-shaped~! It's cute♡』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: And there are all kinds of marks all over……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……your bag's amazing, isn't it, Tore-cchi? 
There's all kinds of memories of us left all over it……

I was sure that every time I look at my bag, I'd 
remember these days. With those memories……no matter 
what happens, I'll be able to move forward.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
――I see…… 
……Yeah……that's right.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Because of that bag……it'll give Tore-cchi strength, and excitement.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……Alllright, then let's change plans! Let's look for a new belt 
for your bag! We'll fix Tore-cchi's important bag up like new――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――so we can make today an important memory too!
